subject: Acceptance of the bank guarantees
text: HRdu <cfv TTTHNf gifachror Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 Fax 91-11-25093507/25093514 (97 98a67, 43F 4fta6t 3t7 RTHIT AATG4 Extn 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping; Road Transport & Highways)" G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/21/2002-Admn February 14, 2005 POLICY MATTER ADMNSTRATIONFINANCE (97/20052 (Decision taken on GM(EW)-Il Note dated 17.01.2005) Sub: Acceptance of Bank Guarantees. Kindly refer to the Policy Circular No. 20/2002 , dated 16th Sept. 2002 and Policy Circular No. 47/2003 dated 5th 2003 vide which the list of the eligible Banks has been prescribed whose Bank Guarantees shall be accepted by NHAI. It has now been decided that the Bank Guarantee issued by the Export Import Bank of India shall also be accepted by NHAI. This issues with the approval of Chairman: (GP. Chand) General Manager (Admn) AIl officers at Headquarters AII Project Directors , PIUs/CMUsISPVs CC for information 1 PS to Chairman 2 _ Director(Audit) , RAP , NHAI 3_ Hindi OfficerILibrarian Muum NHAL May To, to:-
